archimate:Principle.name: Dependent
archimate:Principle.documentation: An Individual whose circumstances or capabilities in a given context requires dependence on a Guardian to administer the Individualâ€™s Identity Data. Under the Sovrin Governance Framework, all Dependents have the right (though perhaps not the circumstances or capabilities) to become Independents. Mutually exclusive with Independent. See Appendix C.
